citation: Proclamation under the Crown Proceedings Amendment Act 2016 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Crown Proceedings Amendment Act 2016

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Crown Proceedings Amendment Act 2016 fix 30 October 2017 as the day on which that Act commences.

30 October 2017

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

ELISE ARCHER

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 30 October 2017
